message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,200,000. I'm confident that it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $900,000? I believe we could reach a fair agreement.

Bob, I understand your position on the budget.  While your offer is appealing, I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $1,050,000?  This reflects a more accurate valuation while still offering you a considerable return on investment.

Thank you for considering my perspective, Alice. I appreciate your response. I would like to propose a price of $950,000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise between our positions and respects the value of the item while keeping the transaction within my budget.
